content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Mining Complex at (-19.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-19.0, -50.0) with wooden chest at (-18.5, -48.5)
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) with wooden chest at (-14.5, -48.5)

###Copper Mining Setup at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill with wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)

###Iron Smelting Setup at (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
- Input chest at (-2.5, 0.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5) and (2.5, 2.5)
- Burner inserters managing input/output
- Additional chest at (4.5, 0.5)

###Copper Smelting Setup at (-6.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (-6.0, 0.0)

###Electronic Circuit Production Line
Consists of:
- Copper cable assembling machine at (18.5, 2.5)
- Input chest at (15.5, 2.5)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 2.5)
- Main electronic circuit assembling machine at (13.5, 5.5)
- Input/output chests at (10.5, 5.5) and (16.5, 5.5)
- Burner inserters managing material flow

###Power Generation System at (-12.0, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-12.0, 20.5)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 20.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert coal with empty inventory
- Always check coal inventory before attempting to insert fuel into entities
- Harvest more coal when running low

### Errors when trying to extract items from assemblers
- Verify that the assembler has completed items before attempting extraction
- Check if the assembler output inventory contains the desired items

### Errors with blocked inserters
- Ensure there is space in destination inventory before inserter operations
- Clear blocked paths and full inventories regularly

### Production bottleneck issues
- Keep material flow consistent by regularly emptying output chests
- Maintain adequate fuel levels in all burner entities
- Monitor and balance input materials for assemblers
